title: Africa: UN to Fund African Union-Led Peace Missions
description: [New Times] The United Nations Security Council has unanimously adopted a resolution on the financing of African Union-led peace support operations, a decision welcomed by UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres.

title: Africa: Black Panther, Wakanda Forever and the Problem With Hollywood - an African Perspective
description: [The Conversation Africa] Black Panther and Black Panther: Wakanda Forever were global hits that played out in an imaginary African kingdom and feature a universe of black creative talent. What's not to love about the franchise? Quite a lot, reckons cultural and literary studies scholar Jeanne-Marie Viljoen. We asked her to explain.

title: Africa: Who Is Clare Akamanzi, the New NBA Africa Chief Executive?
description: [New Times] Clare Akamanzi, an international trade and investment lawyer who has been a key player in Rwanda's business ecosystem and promoting the tourism and innovation sectors, was on December 27, appointed as the Chief Executive Officer of NBA Africa.

title: Africa: Rwanda's Akamanzi Appointed NBA Africa CEO
description: [New Times] The National Basketball Association (NBA) on Wednesday, December 27, appointed Rwanda's Clare Akamanzi as the Chief Executive Officer of NBA Africa.

title: Africa: African Nations Forge New Paths in Global Diplomacy
description: [DW] African countries are assuming an increasingly individualistic approach to foreign policy that are sometimes at odds with those of international powers.

title: Africa: An African History of Cannabis Offers Fascinating and Heartbreaking Insights - an Expert Explains
description: [The Conversation Africa] When I tell people that I research cannabis, I sometimes receive a furtive gesture that implies and presumes: "We're both stoners!", as if two members of a secret society have met.
